column1: Smoque BBQ////I have to say thank you to my friend Eric for introducing us to this place. You really can't go wrong with anything here. The brisket is my favorite
column2: so tender and juicy and with the sauce just pushes it over the top. Thanks to the owner Al too. He was so cool and gave our friend a free shirt cause he's moving to Baltimore. The sides are ssooo good too. I'm not a big fan of beans
column6: but there I will have one of each thank you. The only downside might be that the line to get in can be long and the place is usually crowded
column7: but isnt that a sign of a place with great food? And it's definitely worth the wait.
